description: Stateproof api calls with valid scheduled transaction ID without scheduled=true

expect to find the scheduled CRYPTOTRANSFER transaction in record file 2019-10-11T14_12_20.026969Z.rcd and
all 4 signature files exist. For the sake of brevity, the base64 encoded file content is replaced with its
